thread.title: Kanye West and Kim Kardashian Are Designing Children's Clothes
thread.title_full: Kanye West and Kim Kardashian Are Designing Children's Clothes

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Kanye West and Kim Kardashian Are Designing Children's Clothes
text:
Kim Kardashian has revealed that she and her husband Kanye West are designing a kids' clothing line. Their model and first collaborator, of course, is their three-year-old daughter North West. Our first look of the collection is the outfit North wore last night, which Kim proudly flaunted on her Snapchat. It consisted of a yellow shearling jacket and a neon yellow sequined dress, which the toddler wore with tube socks and black Vans.
Kim Kardashian / Snapchat Kim Kardashian / Snapchat Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "Daddy and mommy are doing a kids' line and these are some of the pieces," she cooed to her daughter in a video. "Northie picked out the colors and the fabric." Apparently, North has an eye for bright hues.
Kim Kardashian / Snapchat
